author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Ukraine International Airport Is Forced To Postpone Operations To AshgabatTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Ukraine International Airport Is Forced To Postpone Operations To Ashgabat  
Ukraine International is forced to postpone the launch of non-stop scheduled flights between Kiev and Ashgabat, scheduled to be operated starting September 21, 2015.
 
Due to current misregulations between the Turkmen and the Ukrainian aviation authorities the Kiev – Ashgabat air line operation is subject to government approval.
 
Passengers, who have purchased tickets for UIA PS625 Kiev – Ashgabat and PS626 Ashgabat – Kiev flights, will be offered a ticket refund or a number of rerouting options.
Source:- UIA
